intent.user_query: Which customer segment (e.g., by city) has the highest average sale amount?

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT c.City, AVG(s.TotalAmount) AS AverageSaleAmount FROM fitness_db.Sales s JOIN fitness_db.Customers c ON s.CustomerID = c.CustomerID GROUP BY c.City ORDER BY AverageSaleAmount DESC LIMIT 1;

arguments.sql: SELECT c.City, AVG(s.TotalAmount) AS AverageSaleAmount FROM fitness_db.Sales s JOIN fitness_db.Customers c ON s.CustomerID = c.CustomerID GROUP BY c.City ORDER BY AverageSaleAmount DESC LIMIT 1;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
